text: int run ( ) ; int main ( ) { int t , x ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; int * p ; x = 0 ; p = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * t ) ; while ( x < t ) p [ x ++ ] = run ( ) ; x = 0 ; while ( x < t ) printf ( "%d\n" , p [ x ++ ] ) ; return 0 ; } int run ( ) { int c = 0 , y ; long int n ; scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; c = n ; long int * ar ; ar = ( long int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( long int ) * n ) ; int x = 0 ; while ( scanf ( "%ld" , & ar [ x ] ) == 1 ) x ++ ; fflush ( stdin ) ; for ( x = 0 ; x < n ; x ++ ) { for ( y = x ; y < n - 1 ; y ++ ) { if ( ar [ y ] <= ar [ y + 1 ] ) c ++ ; else break ; } } return c ; }
